document.query: CREATE TABLE `goTasty_enquiry` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_name` varchar(255), `client_email` varchar(255), `message` varchar(255), `type` varchar(255), `browser` varchar(255), `country` varchar(255), `device` varchar(255), `ip_address` varchar(255), `created_at` datetime, `updated_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
